ruleArticles:
<js>
title='';
url=baseUrl.match(/com\/(.*)/)[1];
c=String(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select("#post-list li"));
if(url !='hot'){
page=result.match(/"cur">(\d+)</)[1];
a=java.ajax("https://www.vmovier.com/post/getbytab?tab="+url+"&page="+page+"&pagepart=2&type=0&controller=index");

b=java.ajax("https://www.vmovier.com/post/getbytab?tab="+url+"&page="+page+"&pagepart=3&type=0&controller=index");

title=String(JSON.parse(a).data)+String(JSON.parse(b).data);}
html=c+title;
org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html)
</js>tag.li

<js>
var data=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
var head=data.select('link')
var down=String(data.select('.apk_topba_code').select('img').attr('src')).replace(/\/qr/,'https://www.coolapk.com/qr')
var part1=String(data.select('.apk_left_one')).replace(/javascript:void\(0\);/,down)
var part2=data.select('.apk_left_first-title')
var part3=data.select('.apk_left_title')
result=head+part1+part2+part3
</js>

ruleNextPage:
<js>
var path1=String(baseUrl).match(/page\/.*\//)[0]
var path2=path1.replace(/page\/|\//g,'')
var num1=Number(path2)+1
var objk=String(baseUrl).replace(/page\/.*\//, 'page/'+num1+'/' )
result=objk
</js>

<js>
var doc1=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var url='https://app.movie'+doc1.getElementsByClass("btn btn-primary").attr("href");
var doc2=org.jsoup.Jsoup.connect(url).get();
var element=doc2.getElementsByClass("stui-player__video");
var text = String(element).replace(/\\/g,"");
var videoSrc=text.match(/"https.*dex.m3u8"/);
var video='<video controls="controls" src='+videoSrc+'>';
result=video
</js>
